subject: Order #SSN4310
description_text: Hello! I'm still waiting for the packages. Somehow it says on the tracking page it's been delivered but I didn't receive anything yet. I hope they are holding it and deliver both packages at once. I can not even contact the deliverer because the app doesn't work on my phone and I've not found a email address on the site. Maybe you can look into it? Kind regards Dennis

conversations.body_text: Hi JD foto,      I apologize for not replying to you promptly. Please verify your address, as it appears to be missing a house number:  Dennis De Martin  Via Unterdorf  39040 Aica BZ  Italy  +39 393 762 2184

Hello,

thank you for your reply. My house number is 4a, the rest of the address is correct.

Kind regards,
Dennis De Martin
________________________________

Hi JD foto,    I see the first package has been delivered, while the second one was returned due to a failed delivery attempt. Please ask your neighbors to look for the first package. For the second package, we'll contact the courier to see if we can arrange a redelivery.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047119767733,SF6047119767779  This is the local logistics for the second package.  https://www.poste.it/cerca-nel-sito/?search=5P65D70190351

Hello,

I will ask around! Do you provide me a tracking link with the second package?

Kind regards,
Dennis
________________________________

Hello,

I found the first package! It got delivered to a condo,
they opened the package and left it on the stair cases.
Now i don't know if something is missing, I will double
check as soon as I return from my work trip.

Meanwhile is there an update with the second delivery?

Kind Regards,
Dennis
________________________________
Hi JD foto,    We are confirming whether the second package can be redelivered.
